summary.body: Hi  Does anyone know how to whiten these original Barbican bathtubs.  I am poised to sell/rent my flat and would like a whiter bathtub to be part of the picture. I once had a cleaner from Abracadabra or somewhere come in and they told me something about soaking the tub overnight with bio or non-bio washing powder - dissolved in cold water.  Does anyone know this or any other tricks? Thanks very much, Jeannie
summary.subject: A whiter bathtub

summary.body: Spice Corner will be arranging a two-course meal with coffee and a glass of wine for 17.50 on Tuesday 24th May, 7.30pm.  A wide selection of starters and main course dishes will be served buffet-style.  The shuffle?  Diners will be allocated different tables for the starters, main course and coffee so that everyone has a chance to mingle.  For more information, or to book, please contact  . Don't forget to look at our website
summary.subject: "Spice Corner Shuffle", Tuesday 24th May

summary.body: Hi Everyone. We live in a small Barbican flat for the last four years and am now my flatmate and I are desperate for more space but couldn't bear to move out from the Barbican. If anyone knows of a tower flat coming up for sale then please bear us in mind.  There's no chain and we could move quickly.  Thanks for your help!
summary.subject: Tower Flat Wanted

summary.body: if interested please email   This will be 8090 west/north facing with views of St pauls and London eye. three bedrooms. on 31st floor
summary.subject: towerblock flat for sale

summary.body: Hi All, Does anyone know of any large One Bedroom flats for rent? I've lived in the Barbican for about 4 years and would like to continue doing so. Cheers Markhester @ Hotmail.com
summary.subject: Large One Bodroom Flat of Rent Wanted
